hackathon-description-text: Register for 24 straight hours of hacking on our collection of music-tech APIs using your programming knowledge and your teammates' skills to develop industry-changing prototypes. Compete to get Harman's Swag Kits, A3C Festival FREE Pass and more. The A3C Music Hackathon is FREE and open to the public with approved application below on this page.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: JBL Everest Elite Headphones & JBL Pulse 2 Speakers
All Access Pass to A3C Festival
Opportunity to join us in Las Vegas at CES 2017

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=40 Courtland St NE, Atlanta, GA 30303, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How original, concrete or realistic is the idea or concept.
How complete or how much of the idea or concept did the group complete that they presented.
How challenging or hard was the idea/concept that they presented and how technically challenging is their product.
How much does this project help with the event or provide value to the overall goals and challenges to either the event or the real world.
How well did the group present their idea or concept.
How reasonable, sustainable or realistic is this idea or concept.

hackathon-location-address: 40 Courtland St NE, Atlanta, GA 30303, USA
